title.narrative: El país, con el apoyo de la OIT, sobre la base de consultas tripartitas, elabora y aplica políticas para la generación de empleo y desarrollo productivo mejorando las perspectivas de empleo para los jóvenes.

description.narrative: The objective is to strengthen the capacities of the government, workers and employers for the implementation of Employment Policies, with better employment prospects for young people. For this, the project will support the development of implementation plans and the development of pilot projects within the framework of the NEP with emphasis on young people from a tripartite perspective. It will support the installation of a NEP monitoring system and strengthen the capacities of employers 'and workers' organizations to participate in the implementation of employment and productive development policies.

participating-org.narrative: Sweden, Swedish International Development Cooperation Agency

department.narrative: Departement of Partnerships and Field Support (PARDEV)

sector.narrative: ILO Results Framework 2020-2021: Output 3.1. Increased capacity of member States to formulate and implement a new generation of gender-responsive national employment policies, including for youth

transaction.ref: GTM/18/52/SWE-2019-GTM129 - Protección laboral proporcionada a las trabajadoras domésticas, particularmente indígenas, con foco en la transición a la economía formal
